title: NERF Cho'Gath NERF Cho'Gath NERF Cho'Gath NERF Cho'Gath NERF Cho'Gath NERF Cho'Gath NERF Cho'Gath
body:
>INSANELY TANKY STATS ONLY BEING ABLE TO BE KILLED BY AN ADC THAT BUILDS TO SHRED TANKS EARLY OR A MAGE WITH HIGH DOT DPS

>CAN ONE SHOT ADCS WITH ONE ABILITY

>CAN SHUT DOWN ANY CHAMPION BY SCREAMING AT THEM AND MAKE THEM USELESS IN TEAM FIGHTS

>HAS A HUGE AOE KNOCK UP WITH AN INSANE AMOUNT OF RANGE AND DAMAGE

>CAN WIN DUELS AND TRADES AGAINST FIGHTERS SIMPLY BY AUTO ATTACKING THEM WITH E

ONE TANK SHOULD NOT BEAT EVERY CLASS AT WHAT THEY'RE MEANT TO DO. HE IS A TANK BRUISER FIGHTER ASSASIN MAGE

replies.body: All I can picture reading this is a 5 year old rolling around on the ground screaming
You are clearly uneducated about your league memes
Your name is god rumble, how can you think cho is OP when you could just lay down the red carpet, and deal some Liandries DoT :/
